title: Asking questions on a train
context: Ask a train employee what time the dining car closes.

content.bestLine: What time does the dining car close?

neutral.text: Can you tell me the dining car hours?
When does the dining car stop serving?
What time is the last call for the dining car?
Is the dining car still open?
Can I still get food in the dining car?
What are the dining car operating hours?
When does the dining car close today?

informal.text: Hey, what time's the dining car close?
Got a minute? What's the dining car schedule?
So, when's the last call for food?
Is the dining car still serving?
Can I grab a bite in the dining car?
What's the haps with the dining car hours?
Mind telling me when the dining car closes?
So, what time does the dining car shut down?

formal.text: Excuse me, what are the dining car hours?
Could you please tell me when the dining car closes?
I would appreciate it if you could inform me of the dining car schedule.
What time does the dining car cease operations?
Could you kindly provide me with the dining car hours of operation?
I would like to know the dining car closing time, please.

patterns.meaning: Asking about the closing time of a facility

patterns.template: Can you tell me the [options] hours?
patterns.meaning: Asking about the hours of operation

dialogs.description: Passenger asking train employee about dining car hours

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Excuse me, what time does the dining car close?

lines.speaker: Train Employee
lines.text: The dining car closes at 9 PM. Would you like to grab a bite before then?

dialogs.description: Passenger inquiring about dining car schedule

lines.speaker: Passenger
lines.text: Hey, can you tell me the dining car schedule?

lines.speaker: Train Employee
lines.text: Let me check. Okay, the dining car is open from 7 AM to 9 PM. We have a limited menu after 8 PM, though.
